item.title: Man hacked to death in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Man hacked to death in Jogulamba Gadwal
A 43-year-old man, Krishnaiah Goud, was killed by two unidentified assailants in Kanchapadu village, Undavalli mandal. The attackers allegedly threw chilli powder into his eyes and stabbed him. Police have registered a case, probing rivalry and financial disputes.
By Telangana Today Updated On - 26 January 2026, 01:28 PM
Representational Image
Jogulamba Gadwal: A 43-year-old man was brutally murdered by two unidentified assailants at Kanchapadu village...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
